TopicTitle: How many of you use TAC?

Articles.Content:
How many of you use TAC Life Support which requires you to have food, water, and oxygen resources to keep your kerbals alive, and also dispose CO2 and waste?

I personally think it's one of the best mods I installed.
I use it. I know that Scott Manley uses it in his Interstellar Quest series.....
I use it! It adds complexity to the flights.

just remember to check in on your flights regularly by switching to them every 30 days or so.. going too long between check ups results in death of crew even if TAC lifesupport monitor shows enough supply left.
